question.text: Choose the incorrect statement about cockroaches from the following.

options.text: Antennae have sensory receptors that help in monitoring the environment.
The head is formed by the fusion of six segments and shows great mobility in all directions due to flexible neck.
The first pair of wings arise from the mesothorax and the second pair from the metathorax.
In males, the genital pouch or chamber lies at the hind end of abdomen bounded ventrally by 9th and 10th terga and dorsally by the 9th sternum.

solution.text: The abdomen in both males and females consists of 10 segments. In females, the 7th sternum is boat shaped and together with the 8th and 9th sterna forms a brood or genital pouch whose anterior part contains female gonopore, spermathecal pores and collateral glands. In males, genital pouch or chamber lies at the hind end of abdomen bounded dorsally by 9th and 10th terga and ventrally by the 9th sternum. It contains dorsal anus, ventral male genital pore and gonapophysis.
